price: 15. Alle baa ku jees-jeesi, wuxuuna kaga tagi xadgudubkooda banbaxsan ee ay ku jaha wareersan yihiin indha la’aan.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَهۡزِئُ بِهِمۡ وَيَمُدُّهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yastahzi-u bihim wayamudduhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
